article.headline: Prairie View 60, Schreiner 42
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Christopher Jones scored 11 points and Darnell Hugee had 16 rebounds to help Prairie View defeat Schreiner 60-42 on Tuesday night. Jones scored all of his points in the first half as Prairie View (3-9) took a 41-26 lead at halftime. He took only one shot in the second half. Riley Battle led Schreiner (1-7) with 13 points, five of those in the second half. Prairie View shot 41 percent from the field while Schreiner shot 31 percent.
